meanings.sent1: The school planner organized the class schedule.
meanings.sent2: The event planner coordinated the wedding details.
meanings.sent3: The party planner always had a plan for every celebration.
meanings.sent4: She was a master planner, mapping out every step of the project.
meanings.sent5: The city planner envisioned a vibrant community for all residents.

meanings.sent1: The digital planner on his phone kept him organized.
meanings.sent2: She used a physical planner to jot down her daily tasks.
meanings.sent3: The high-tech planner helped streamline the workflow.
meanings.sent4: The GPS acted as a reliable planner for their road trip.
meanings.sent5: The meal planner app suggested healthy recipes for the week.

meanings.definition: A book or similar item for recording plans.
meanings.sent1: Her planner was filled with notes and reminders.
meanings.sent2: He carried his planner everywhere to stay on top of appointments.
meanings.sent3: The old planner held memories of past events and goals.
meanings.sent4: The worn-out planner was a testament to her busy schedule.
meanings.sent5: The travel planner contained maps and itineraries for the trip.
